    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
           throws DIHException
        This method is called when a job is starting. It permits to make some initialising stuff before starting a import job. For example, on JDBCDataSource we create a database connection.
        Specified by:
        start in class AbstractDataSource
        Throws:
        DIHException - if any.

      • execute

        public JDBCResultList execute(generated.EntityType entity,
                              Map<String,Object> state)
                       throws DIHException
        Datasource must have an execute method to perform the entity work.
        Specified by:
        execute in class AbstractDataSource
        Parameters:
        entity - Xml bean Entity.
        state - The current state of variables of the import.
        Returns:
        a AbstractResultList object.
        Throws:
        DIHException - if any.

      • finish

        public void finish()
            throws DIHException
        This method is called when a job is ending. It permits to close all open resources. For example, on JDBCDataSource we release the database connection.
        Specified by:
        finish in class AbstractDataSource
        Throws:
        DIHException - if any.
